title: Protect the Public Domain: Stop the 70-year term for non-creative photographs
content:
Italy has adopted a legal amendment to extend the term of exclusive rights for simple photographs from 20 to 70 years, a drastic shift that may cause serious damage, unless corrective action is taken. For decades, Italian copyright law has recognised the dual nature of photography: creative photographs, protected as full copyright works for 70 […]

title: The Digital Omnibus and open data: Risks for open projects
content:
